title: Urusei Yatsura Movie 3: Remember My Love
synopsis: It seems that when Lum was born, a postal screwup resulted in a witchy friend of the family not getting an invitation to the celebration. The witch put a curse on Lum, that she would never be happy with her True Love.
voices: ['Hirano, Fumi', 'Furukawa, Toshio', 'Kamiya, Akira', 'Iwata, Mitsuo', 'Komiya, Kazue', 'Nagai, Ichiro', 'Shimazu, Saeko', 'Chiba, Shigeru', 'Washio, Machiko', 'Sugiyama, Kazuko']
staff: [['Yamazaki, Kazuo', ['Director']], ['Anno, Hideaki', ['Key Animation']], ['Takahashi, Rumiko', ['Original Creator']], ['Takada, Akemi', ['Character Design']]]
